duties_responsibilities.duty: In charge of a portfolio of real estate assets’ financial operations, including daily accounting entries, monthly closing, external and internal financial reporting, FP&A, budgeting and other related tasks.
Conduct financial planning analysis by using various reporting tools including operation performance variance analysis, forecast, budget etc.

Perform, analyze and manage treasury/cash flow of assets, work closely with other finance team members to focus on enhancing cash management process, including timely payments and cash flow forecast etc.
Assist various other financial duties, including internally to senior management and externally to lenders, help external audit process etc.
Collaborate with various business and finance teams in headquarters to gather information and to resolve any questions they have regarding US operations.
Report directly to CFO of US Operations.
Master or bachelor degree with major in Finance or Accounting.
Minimum 5 years of relevant working experience, with background in or related to Real Estate is extremely desired.
Bilingual in Mandarin is a must.
Highly proactive and willing to take initiatives and provide solutions.
Big 4 experience is a big plus.

education_certification.credential: Master or Bachelor degree with major in Finance or Accounting.
